item.title: Gayle add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world." -- Voltaire

item.title: Gayle add a quote by Robert Newton Peck
Gayle add a quote by Joseph Schumpeter
item.description: "The first thing a man will do for his ideals is lie." -- Joseph Schumpeter
